days.text: Dry. Cloudy apart from sunny periods. Force 3 to 4 north to northeasterly winds.
Dry. Cloudy apart from sunny periods. Force 2 to 4 east to northeasterly winds.
Dry. Fine apart from cloudy periods. Force 2 to 3 northeasterly winds.
Fine, becoming cloudy. A few rain patches later. Force 3 to 4 east to northeasterly winds.
Mainly cloudy. Periods of rain. Force 3 to 4 east to northeasterly winds.
